verses.text: \w But|strong="G1161"\w* I \w determined|strong="G2919"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* with \w myself|strong="G1683"\w*, that I \w would|strong="G2064"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaviness|strong="G3077"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w make|strong="G3076"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w sorry|strong="G3076"\w*, \w who|strong="G5101"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* \w then|strong="G2532"\w* that \w maketh|strong="G2165"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w glad|strong="G2165"\w*, \w but|strong="G1487"\w* the same \w which|strong="G3588"\w* is made \w sorry|strong="G3076"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I \w wrote|strong="G1125"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w lest|strong="G2443"\w*, when I \w came|strong="G2064"\w*, I should \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w sorrow|strong="G3077"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* them of \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G3165"\w* \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* to \w rejoice|strong="G5463"\w*; having \w confidence|strong="G3982"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \add the joy\add* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w affliction|strong="G2347"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w anguish|strong="G4928"\w* of \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* I \w wrote|strong="G1125"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w with|strong="G1223"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w tears|strong="G1144"\w*; \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye should be \w grieved|strong="G3076"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye might \w know|strong="G1097"\w* the \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* I \w have|strong="G2192"\w* more \w abundantly|strong="G4056"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* have caused \w grief|strong="G3076"\w*, he \w hath|strong="G3076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w grieved|strong="G3076"\w* \w me|strong="G1691"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w in|strong="G0575"\w* \w part|strong="G3313"\w*: \w that|strong="G2443"\w* I \w may|strong="G1912"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w overcharge|strong="G1912"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w Sufficient|strong="G2425"\w* to such a \w man|strong="G5108"\w* \add is\add* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w punishment|strong="G2009"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \add was inflicted\add* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w many|strong="G4119"\w*.

So \w that|strong="G5620"\w* \w contrariwise|strong="G5121"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* \add ought\add* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w* to \w forgive|strong="G5483"\w* \add him\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w comfort|strong="G3870"\w* \add him\add*, lest \w perhaps|strong="G3381"\w* such a \w one|strong="G5108"\w* should be swallowed \w up|strong="G2666"\w* with \w overmuch|strong="G4053"\w* \w sorrow|strong="G3077"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* I \w beseech|strong="G3870"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* that ye would \w confirm|strong="G2964"\w* \add your\add* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \w toward|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* this \w end|strong="G5124"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* did I \w write|strong="G1125"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* I might \w know|strong="G1097"\w* the \w proof|strong="G1382"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w whether|strong="G1487"\w* ye \w be|strong="G2075"\w* \w obedient|strong="G5255"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*.

To \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* ye \w forgive|strong="G5483"\w* any \w thing|strong="G5100"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \add forgive\add* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w forgave|strong="G5483"\w* any \w thing|strong="G5100"\w*, to \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* I \w forgave|strong="G5483"\w* \add it\add*, \w for|strong="G1223"\w* your \w sakes|strong="G5209"\w* \add forgave I it\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w person|strong="G4383"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*;

\w Lest|strong="G2443"\w* \w Satan|strong="G4567"\w* should get an \w advantage|strong="G4122"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* us: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* we \w are|strong="G0050"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w ignorant|strong="G0050"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w devices|strong="G3540"\w*.

\w Furthermore|strong="G1161"\w*, when I \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Troas|strong="G5174"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \add preach\add* \w Christâ€™s|strong="G5547"\w* \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w door|strong="G2374"\w* was \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w of|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*,

I \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w rest|strong="G0425"\w* \w in|strong="G4151"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, because \w I|strong="G3165"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w Titus|strong="G5103"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* taking my \w leave|strong="G0657"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, I went from \w thence|strong="G1831"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w thanks|strong="G5485"\w* \add be\add* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, which \w always|strong="G3842"\w* \w causeth|strong="G2358"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* to triumph \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* maketh \w manifest|strong="G5319"\w* the \w savour|strong="G3744"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* we \w are|strong="G2070"\w* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w* a sweet \w savour|strong="G2175"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* them \w that|strong="G3588"\w* are \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* them \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w perish|strong="G0622"\w*:

To the \w one|strong="G3739"\w* \add we are\add* the \w savour|strong="G3744"\w* of \w death|strong="G2288"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* to the \w other|strong="G3739"\w* the \w savour|strong="G3744"\w* of \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* \add is\add* \w sufficient|strong="G2425"\w* \w for|strong="G4314"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*?

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* we \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w*, which \w corrupt|strong="G2585"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w sincerity|strong="G1505"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, in the \w sight|strong="G2714"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* speak \w we|strong="G2980"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.
